thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: Mario

author: Mario
title: Mario
text: Africa, for instance, continues to be a source of hand carved primitive art, but as political bandits continue to terrorize and cut off hands of natives, including that of children's, the world will be left in poverty of diverse culture. Modern technology gave us virtual digital reproductions of art work, but for its blinding velocity on providing us with images, the viewer's ability to peruse and digest are negated. Only books can engage the viewer/reader in truly appreciating the contents and intents of culture.
